*div1 type="summary"* *p*James Grant to Austin, May 13, 1826. One George Nixon is trying to discredit Austin with certain Mexican authorities.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="05-13-1826">May 13th 1826*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*Col Austin*/person_mentioned**/p* *p*Dear Sir*/p*
*p*I wrote you from *location_mentioned*Camargo */location_mentioned*by *person_mentioned*Colnl Milim*/person_mentioned*; that it was impossible for me a while yet to visit your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*; owing to my business, and now I must say, it will be some time longer; but I hope this will not interfeer with the Tittle to my land; Indead the *person_mentioned*General*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*Priest*/person_mentioned*, and *person_mentioned*Alcalde*/person_mentioned*, in this place all voluntary offered to give me certificates that, I have been constantly a *person_mentioned*Citizen */person_mentioned*of the *location_mentioned*State*/location_mentioned*.—*/p*
*p*I am sorry to inform you that I have found in this *location_mentioned*Town */location_mentioned*one *person_mentioned*Enemy */person_mentioned*to your *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*; and more sorry when that *person_mentioned*Enemy */person_mentioned*goes under the name of an *person_mentioned*American*/person_mentioned*; A *person_mentioned*George Nixon*/person_mentioned* who is well known to you from the disturbance he tryd to make when on the *location_mentioned*Rio Brazos*/location_mentioned*; and who has taken particular pains to shew me all the documents, in order to draw me to his side.—*/p*
*p*He has now become more dangerous, the "Woolf has put on the sheeps Clothing", he got babtized in this place the other day, and with these people his word will have more weight he has tryd very hard here with the *person_mentioned*General */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*Priest */person_mentioned*to represent your Conduct in a bad light; and more particularly with the *person_mentioned*Priest*/person_mentioned*, whose *person_mentioned*Uncle*/person_mentioned* is one of the *person_mentioned*Secretaries of the department of *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* (the *person_mentioned*Priest */person_mentioned*is my particular *person_mentioned*friend*/person_mentioned*) and I think a *person_mentioned*Gentleman*/person_mentioned*, and a *person_mentioned*man of Education*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Nixon*/person_mentioned* speaks very bad Spanish, worse than I do, and in that respect I have a preponderent ascendency over him, which I have made use of, feeling it my duty, as well as my interest to promote the Prosperity of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*, and have thereby warded off the Edge of his malignance here, and set your Conduct in its proper light.—*/p*
*p*I have taken the liberty to give you this information, should it be beneficial to you it will give me pleasure.—depend upon all my influence, and exertion, for the protection and welfare of the *location_mentioned*Colony*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*James Grant*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
